mapper.select: select YNO as yNo,Y_StuName as stuName,Y_StuNo as stuNo,Y_class as stuClazz,Y_BookNo as bookNo,Y_book as bookName,Y_time as orderTime,IsBorrow as isBorrow from yuyue where Y_StuName like #{username} limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(YNO) from yuyue where Y_StuName like #{username}
mapper.update: update yuyue set Y_StuName = #{stuName},Y_StuNo = #{stuNo},Y_class = #{stuClazz},Y_BookNo = #{bookNo},Y_book = #{bookName},Y_time = #{orderTime},IsBorrow = #{isBorrow} where YNO = #{yNo}
delete from yuyue where YNO in (${value})
